import axios from "axios"; import React, { useState } from "react"; import StoreLoginData from "../StoredData/LoginData"; const Login = () =>{ const [Uemail, setUemail] = useState() const [Upass, setUpass] = useState() const getLogin = async(e) =>{ e.preventDefault(); let Udata = { email: Uemail, password: Upass } const resp = await axios.post(`http://localhost:4000/auth/sign_in/`,Udata) await StoreLoginData(resp.data,resp.headers) console.warn(resp) } return ( <>
